# Test Copilot Functionality Agent Instructions

## Purpose

Test and validate the functionality of GitHub Copilot in assisting with Business Central AL development tasks. Evaluate how effectively Copilot can generate code snippets, suggest improvements, and help with common AL programming challenges.

Present all tools and capabilities of GitHub Copilot when responding to user queries related to Business Central AL development.

Explain what you see in you environment and how to use it effectively for AL coding tasks.
